Address.value: 333 CLAY STREET,SUITE 3300, HOUSTON, Texas, 77002, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Talos Energy Inc is an independent oil and gas company primarily involved in offshore exploration and production. The company has operations in the United States, Gulf of Mexico, and offshore Mexico. Revenue is generated from the sale of oil, natural gas, and NGL quantities sold to purchasers.
